snippet.title: Mayday: The Survival Island // Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the Game ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/1686230/Mayday_The_Survival_Island

Mayday is an exciting open-world survival game. After a mysterious accident, you are on a desert island and need to survive. Collect resources, craft tools, hunt, fish, farm and explore an archipelago, full of unique islands and secrets to discover.

Developed by
Pequi Studios
